mapper.insert: insert into t_fix (fix_id, community_id, type, date, time, text, flag, owner_id) values (#{fixId},#{communityId},#{type},#{date},#{time},#{text},#{flag},#{ownerId});
mapper.select: select * from t_fix where flag = 0 and community_id = #{communityId}
select * from t_fix where flag = 1 and community_id = #{communityId}
mapper.update: update t_fix set flag = #{flag} where fix_id = #{fixId}
